title: Steve Harvey's Daughter Lori Flaunts Toned Abs in String Bikini
description: The model, 28, turned heads with her fit physique.
content:
Steve Harvey's daughter, Lori Harvey, flaunted her toned abs in a string bikini in a new photo shared on social media.

On Thursday, Aug. 14, the model, 28, took to her Instagram Stories with a snap of herself rocking a two-piece swimsuit.

🎬 SIGN UP for Parade's Daily newsletter to get the latest pop culture news & celebrity interviews delivered right to your inbox 🎬

In a series of segments, the adult child of the Family Feud host shared pictures of a trip to Ibiza, Spain. A mirror selfie showed Lori donning a brown string bikini with an article of clothing wrapped around her bottom half. She pursed her lips while posing with another bikini-clad woman in the candid shot.

See the stunning new photo of Lori in a bikini here.

In June, Lori dropped jaws in a shell-colored bikini in a video posted on her Instagram grid.

"Summer is here ✨," she captioned the clip, which showed her confidently posing in the two-piece and a bucket hat while riding on a large boat.

Folks in the comments showered the model with words of praise for her fit physique in the comments.

Another wrote, "Her Body is so Crazy 🔥."

Someone else echoed, "You look stunning ☀️."

Meanwhile, yet another follower commented, "And you're the Summer Goddess 🙌🔥."

In addition to Lori, Steve shares six children: twins Karli and Brandi, sons Broderick, Wynton and Jason, and daughters Morgan and Lori.

Next: Kylie Jenner’s BFF Drops Jaws While Flaunting Assets in Teeny-Tiny String Bikini

Steve Harvey's Daughter Lori Flaunts Toned Abs in String Bikini first appeared on Parade on Aug 15, 2025

This story was originally reported by Parade on Aug 15, 2025, where it first appeared.
summary: Steve Harvey's daughter, Lori Harvey, has posted a stunning photo of her toned abs in a string bikini on her Instagram Stories. The 28-year-old model, who is also the adult child of Family Feud host Steve Harvey, shared the image alongside a series of pictures from a trip to Ibiza, Spain. The comments in the post were largely complimentary, with one calling her "Her Body is so Crazy."
shortSummary: Steve Harvey's daughter Lori Harvey showcased her toned abs in a string bikini on Instagram, celebrating her 28th birthday.
argos_summary: Lori Harvey, the 28‑year‑old daughter of comedian and host Steve Harvey, posted a new Instagram story on August 14 showing her in a brown string bikini while on a trip to Ibiza, Spain. The photo, part of a series of beach shots, highlighted her toned abs and received praise from followers who commented on her fit physique and beauty. Harvey’s family includes six children: twins Karli and Brandi, sons Broderick, Wynton, and Jason, and daughter Morgan. The story was originally reported by Parade on August 15, 2025.
